title: Dodo
description:
A brown or gray dodo shown in full profile. Generally depicted with a curved yellow beak, small wings, a fluffy white tail, yellow or orange feet, and black talons.

May be used to represent dodos or the concept of being extinct.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's dodo emoji renders this extinct bird with a plump, endearing body and a distinctive curved beak, colored in gentle earthy tones. The design, characteristic of Apple's approach, features subtle 3D shading and soft, rounded forms, giving it a friendly and somewhat nostalgic appearance. It serves as a unique symbol for extinction, history, or a quirky, memorable reference in digital communication.
